data.name: Spellbook Demonslayers Prologue - Toss A Coin To Your Dev
data.detailed_description:
Donation DLC

This allows you to toss me a coin to support the development of Spellbook Demonslayers!

You won't get any additional content or features for buying this DLC, and it does not count towards a discount of the full game.
Thank you for supporting Spellbook Demonslayers!

I'd love to hear your honest thoughts and feedback about the game in a Steam Review for Spellbook Demonslayers Prologue:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2070390/Spellbook_Demonslayers_Prologue/
